abstract: Tuesday on CBS: “The Mentalist,” a promising new crime drama.
snippet: Tuesday on CBS: “The Mentalist,” a promising new crime drama.
lead_paragraph: On CBS Tuesday night, new seasons of “NCIS” and “Without a Trace” premiere at 8 and 10 p.m. respectively. And sandwiched in between the two shows is “The Mentalist,” a promising new crime drama featuring “a celebrity medium turned consultant with the California Bureau of Investigation, who has a knack for solving serious crimes when forensics experts can’t.”
